definitions.title: adj. verb.
definitions.body: delighting in, having pleasure in;—´[[ח]] Ps 5:5 + 4 t.; pl. [[חֲפֵחִים]] Mal 3:1, Ne 1:11; cstr. [[חֲפֵחֵי]] Ps 35:27 + 2 t.; sf. [[חֶפְחֵיהֶם]] Ps 111:2; f. [[חֲפֵחָָה]] 1Ch 28:9; —

of man, c. acc. Ps 34:13, Ps 35:27, Mal 3:1; c. inf. Ne 1:11; abs. [[הֶחָפֵץ]] whosoever would 1Ki 13:33; [[אם חפץ אתה]] if thou pleasest 1Ki 21:6; [[נֶפֶשׁ חֲפֵחָה]] willing soul 1Ch 28:9; pl. cstr. before nouns abs. Ps 35:22, Ps 40:15 = Ps 70:3; [[דְּרוּשִׁים לְכָל־חֶפְחֵיהֶם]] studied of all who take pleasure in them Ps 111:2.
of God, [[לאׁ אֵל־]] [[חָפֵץ רֶשַׁע אַתָּה]] thou art not a God taking pleasure in wickedness Ps 5:5.
